New York City has enacted an expanded Safe and Sick Leave Bill, while the government shutdown impacts local airports and SNAP benefits, amidst ongoing issues like rising housing costs and job cuts at Amazon, highlighting the city's complex socio-economic landscape.

### Civics & Politics

- New York City's Expanded Safe And Sick Leave Bill becomes law, enhancing employee rights. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Government shutdown impacts New York-area airports and SNAP benefits; residents should prepare for potential disruptions. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMivwFBVV95cUxPUW9vSXcwc0VyZTltYy11bW5aY2Z6TkVKekd3b2FfWUpVdzF5dm8wSEt1bU5rMTJhMXo2cmItN0xwMllrZGpEd3NXb2M2V0xFb1VYNVpxVkhVYW50OHhtZ3h3QWdNbjZzb3FBV1JBWDBEVERnNHZ6bWFjSWdsNmdnOS0yVzlwdDJUdnJSbWNoT1lIUUhaVV8wdGFEOGh0NWlEXzNOZXNSdURtZUt5bnljUmlDLUNGNllGV2VmanN4VQ?oc=5)
- Developer sued for damage to a landmarked building that displaced elderly, rent-stabilized tenants; city action demanded. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMi_?oc=5)
- Chair of NYPD watchdog CCRB resigns following a feud with the police union; implications for oversight remain unclear. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMibkFVX3lxTFBzTTlQX2ZDTU9MS0JrT3gzRmJUZC14elVDNXBOMFBDck4xeS1rcGc4LUFqWnVtdFd4NGpESnZaeDBKT0pfdHF3RjU3U0VTZndLbnNVaTRqSV9GT1ZVNTlPc3lhd0lYRERHRmZ4VFdR?oc=5)
- City Hall supports Bronx student detained by ICE while pursuing a career in mechanics; advocates call for reform. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMidkFVX3lxTE1nakwweEJDcnN6aURxT1dsWUhGQXZIZFE4c3ZRMnRrSlB4bnNZcGdDd1dzODVWTUxleThFR1J6SmRLSThiZFpoVlRqZEt2dlBWQXRrUXZpeWpJX1ZrMDZETHJvb2d1ZGpsakV4SlcxRzJuYUhLRFE?oc=5)
- Four more city bus routes equipped with cameras to enforce illegal parking and bus lane violations. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMif0FVX3lxTE1aa2lrRDdJODVjV21BWllBTmRIejJmZm1rNmJCN2Nob1AzOWI1amRMWUdyYldhMkxmT1J6dTdOeUZMTDcySEVHWnUyUzVXY1ZmQThJRmJvVmt6VzJMV3VoYU1NSFlqVjZXcGlXaVBzZkVHVkNDM3NhQVcxWWRiNDQ?oc=5)
- NYC housing affordability crisis worsens as median home prices reach a new record high; residents face increased living costs. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)

### Opportunities & Welfare

- State has eliminated $300M in victim-services grants, jeopardizing essential programs. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqwFBVV95cUxQUDJoMjN5ZzlRaHo5dEFPdUNwNU5QRDNsQVd0WXB5VnQ5Umhnc2ljTTZEMlQtYzdfUVE1SmJVT2huWVRURWVUT21peWxUZ2Itc2wzbWNTTkt4akR0TmFURkFpdnNPNVZpX3BwTFdlanA4dE5wU0FGalJBN3prbk03bWRpSmhMYTlFMXdNZlFRQVVxY3hJZGk3ZzlOUmV2RXRrUVFTQ0tsUVFoME0?oc=5)
- Amazon is cutting nearly 700 jobs in NYC as part of a larger reduction of 30,000 positions.
